articles.title: Epic Games alleges Google not complying with Indian antitrust order - Reuters
articles.description: U.S. firm Epic Games is challenging Google in an Indian tribunal for not complying with some portions of an antitrust directive, alleging that the tech giant is not hosting the gaming company's app store on Google's Play Store app.
